parameters.query: SELECT COUNT(*) as total_orders, SUM(total_amount) as total_revenue, COUNT(CASE WHEN status = 'shipped' THEN 1 END) as shipped_orders, COUNT(CASE WHEN status = 'pending' THEN 1 END) as pending_orders, COUNT(DISTINCT platform) as platforms_count FROM orders_unified WHERE tenant_id = $1 AND DATE(created_at) = $2

SELECT COUNT(*) as total_products, COUNT(CASE WHEN physical_quantity = 0 THEN 1 END) as out_of_stock, COUNT(CASE WHEN physical_quantity <= 3 AND physical_quantity > 0 THEN 1 END) as low_stock, SUM(physical_quantity * COALESCE(cost_price, 0)) as inventory_value FROM inventory_master WHERE tenant_id = $1

SELECT COUNT(*) as total_tasks, COUNT(CASE WHEN priority = 'high' THEN 1 END) as high_priority, COUNT(CASE WHEN status = 'pending' THEN 1 END) as pending_tasks, COUNT(CASE WHEN task_type = 'inquiry' THEN 1 END) as inquiry_count FROM admin_tasks WHERE tenant_id = $1 AND DATE(created_at) = $2

SELECT COUNT(*) as total_listed, COUNT(CASE WHEN status = 'active' THEN 1 END) as active_listings, AVG(CASE WHEN listing_price > 0 THEN (listing_price - COALESCE(cost_price,0)) / listing_price * 100 END) as avg_margin FROM products_master WHERE tenant_id = $1 AND status IN ('active', 'listed')

INSERT INTO performance_snapshots (tenant_id, snapshot_date, sales_data, inventory_data, tasks_data, listings_data, created_at) VALUES ($1, $2, $3::jsonb, $4::jsonb, $5::jsonb, $6::jsonb, NOW()) ON CONFLICT (tenant_id, snapshot_date) DO UPDATE SET sales_data = EXCLUDED.sales_data, inventory_data = EXCLUDED.inventory_data, tasks_data = EXCLUDED.tasks_data, listings_data = EXCLUDED.listings_data, updated_at = NOW() RETURNING id
